usecase_config¶

namespace EPD

A collection of use-case filters, namely for parsing usecase_config.txt, Counting and Color-Matching usecaseMode.

Functions

std::vector<std::string> generateCountClassNames()¶

A Getter function that parses the usecase_config.txt if a Counting usecaseMode is selected and populates a list of selected object names intended to be counted.

void count(std::vector<std::array<float, 4>> &bboxes, std::vector<uint64_t> &classIndices, std::vector<float> &scores, std::vector<std::string> allClassNames)¶

A Mutator function that takes the base inference results from a P2 inference engine and excludes any bounding boxes, classIndices and score element that do not share the label of selected objects-to-be counted.

void matchColor(const cv::Mat &img, std::vector<std::array<float, 4>> &bboxes, std::vector<uint64_t> &classIndices, std::vector<float> &scores, std::vector<std::string> allClassNames)¶

A Mutator function that takes the base inference results from a P2 inference engine and excludes any bounding boxes, classIndices and score element that is not similar enough to the template color..

void activateUseCase(const cv::Mat &img, std::vector<std::array<float, 4>> &bboxes, std::vector<uint64_t> &classIndices, std::vector<float> &scores, std::vector<std::string> allClassNames)¶

A Mutator function that takes the base inference results from a P2 inference engine and excludes any bounding boxes, classIndices and score element based on a selected use-case filter.

void count(std::vector<std::array<float, 4>> &bboxes, std::vector<uint64_t> &classIndices, std::vector<float> &scores, std::vector<cv::Mat> &masks, std::vector<std::string> allClassNames)¶

A Mutator function that takes the base inference results from a P3 inference engine and excludes any bounding boxes, classIndices and score element that do not share the label of selected objects-to-be counted.

void matchColor(const cv::Mat &img, std::vector<std::array<float, 4>> &bboxes, std::vector<uint64_t> &classIndices, std::vector<float> &scores, std::vector<cv::Mat> &masks, std::vector<std::string> allClassNames)¶

A Mutator function that takes the base inference results from a P3 inference engine and excludes any bounding boxes, classIndices and score element that is not similar enough to the template color..

void activateUseCase(const cv::Mat &img, std::vector<std::array<float, 4>> &bboxes, std::vector<uint64_t> &classIndices, std::vector<float> &scores, std::vector<cv::Mat> &masks, std::vector<std::string> allClassNames)¶

A Mutator function that takes the base inference results from a P3 inference engine and excludes any bounding boxes, classIndices and score element based on a selected use-case filter.
